ProductInfo.Features:
4 Channel Full WD1 realtime record and playback surveillance DVR.
Powerful Push alarm function to push every alarm information to your cell phone.
Free DDNS; Free client software base on MAC OS and Windows; Free App for iPhone/iPad/Android/Windows phone.
Compatible with a variety of browsers,including IE10 (32bit and 64bit),Safari,.Chrome and Firefox.
FTP function and e-mail alerts with snapshot; Powerful Plug and Play function to solve the complicated network set problem.
ProductInfo.Name: Guardian In-D3404SEAF H.264 4 Channel Security Surveillance CCTV Video Recorder Standalone DVR System with 1 TB Hard Drive Preinstalled (Black)
